title: It Ends with Us
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Lily hasn't always had it easy, but that's never stopped her from working hard for the life she wants.

title: Verity
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Lowen Ashleigh is a struggling writer on the brink of financial ruin when she accepts the job offer of a lifetime.

title: Slammed
author: Colleen Hoover
description: After the unexpected death of her father, eighteen-year-old Layken becomes the rock for both her mother and younger brother.

title: Point of Retreat
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Hardships and heartache have brought them together, but will they be enough to keep them together?

title: This Girl
author: Colleen Hoover
description: There are two sides to every love story. Now hear Will's.

title: Hopeless
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Sky encounters Dean Holder, a guy with a reputation that rivals her own.

title: Losing Hope
author: Colleen Hoover
description: In Hopeless, Sky left no secret unearthed, no feeling unshared, and no memory forgotten, but Holder's past remains a mystery.

title: Finding Cinderella
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A chance encounter leads eighteen-year-old Daniel and the girl who stumbles into his professing of love to make a pact.

title: Maybe Someday
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Sydney is living in an idyllic bubble—she's a dedicated student with a steady job on the side.

title: Ugly Love
author: Colleen Hoover
description: When Tate Collins meets airline pilot Miles Archer, she doesn't think it's love at first sight.

title: Confess
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Auburn Reed has her entire life mapped out. Her goals are in sight and there's no room for mistakes.

title: November 9
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Fallon meets Ben, an aspiring novelist, the day before her scheduled cross-country move.

title: Too Late
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Sloan will go through hell and back for those she loves. And she does so, every single day.

title: Without Merit
author: Colleen Hoover
description: The Voss family is anything but normal.

title: All Your Perfects
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Quinn and Graham’s perfect love is threatened by their imperfect marriage.

title: Regretting You
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Morgan Grant and her sixteen-year-old daughter, Clara, would like nothing more than to be nothing alike.

title: Heart Bones
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Beyah Grim's life is only a few short weeks away from having to carve her own path.

title: Layla
author: Colleen Hoover
description: When Leeds meets Layla, he’s convinced he’ll spend the rest of his life with her.

title: Reminders of Him
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A troubled young mother yearns for a shot at redemption in this heartbreaking yet hopeful story.

title: It Starts with Us
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Lily and her ex-husband, Ryle, have just settled into a civil coparenting rhythm when she suddenly bumps into her first love, Atlas Corrigan.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The mysterious Jay Gatsby's passion for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: The unforgettable novel of a childhood in a sleepy Southern town and the crisis of conscience that rocked it.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the future.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: Santiago's journey to the pyramids of Egypt to find a treasure.

title: The Kite Runner
author: Khaled Hosseini
description: The heartbreaking story of the unlikely friendship between a wealthy boy and the son of his father’s servant.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry Potter has no idea how famous he is. That's because he's being raised by his miserable aunt and uncle who are terrified Harry will learn that he's really a wizard.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: Bilbo Baggins is a hobbit who enjoys a comfortable, unambitious life, rarely travelling further than the pantry of his hobbit-hole in Bag End.

title: A Game of Thrones
author: George R.R. Martin
description: Summers span decades. Winter can last a lifetime. And the struggle for the Iron Throne has begun.

title: The Name of the Wind
author: Patrick Rothfuss
description: The tale of Kvothe, from his childhood in a troupe of traveling players to his years as a near-feral orphan in a crime-ridden city.

title: Percy Jackson: The Lightning Thief
author: Rick Riordan
description: Percy Jackson is about to be kicked out of boarding school... again. And that's the least of his troubles.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: Marriage can be a real killer.

title: The Girl on the Train
author: Paula Hawkins
description: Rachel catches the same commuter train every morning. She knows it will wait at the same signal each time, overlooking a row of back gardens.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: Alicia Berenson’s life is seemingly perfect. A famous painter married to an in-demand fashion photographer.

title: The Da Vinci Code
author: Dan Brown
description: While in Paris, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is awakened by a phone call in the dead of the night.
